issue.title: [R] R Appveyor job does not test changes in the C++ library
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5963](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5963). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems like master is being used 

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/PKGBUILD#L42

I observed this in 

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/wesm/arrow/builds/26030853/job/7vn8q3l8e24t83jh?fullLog=true

from this PR

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4841 for ARROW-5893

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5963?focusedCommentId=16888138) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4900
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4900>
